resources.string: It looks you didn\'t allow this app to use your camera or external storage. This is necessary to take pictures and save then to your devices. Please go to permissions screen, find MyInsta and unlock this permissions to use the app.
Your external storage is unavailable. Please make sure you are not connected to a pc or sd card was not removed.
You have few space available, please make sure your have more than 5MB on disk to take pictures!
Something went wrong during file creation, please try again and make sure you have disk space and enough power before taking pictures!
